title: Sci-fi Horror and Machine ambient
description: Sci-fi ambient with a high-quality dynamic sound that can capture the atmosphere of any Sci-fi or horror-type game project.
longDescription:
YouTube short Audio Preview (Use headphone)


Sci-fi ambient with a high-quality dynamic sound that can capture the atmosphere of any Sci-fi or horror-type game project.


Using our analog oscillator and some machinery records from our nearest factory we mixed the sound and balanced the dynamic low end to create a realistic horror sci-fi ambient.


You will find some scary machinery ambient, Motor rotation, Generator room ambient., etc with seamless loop capability.


Total 20 ambient audio tracks each with 20 min duration.


The key feature of the ambient audio:


* Robot Factory ambient

• Machine and rotor ambient

• Cave generator ambient

• Hydraulic pressure and various hydraulic ambient

• Electro and phasing ambient

• Nuclear generator ambient and many more.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 400 min

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Link (or a description of where users can find) the documentation
